de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.extensions

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.core.ExtensionModule
      • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.extensions.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationListener, XMLStreamable

    public class Graph
extends ExtensionModule
    This module contains an implementation of spatial environment graph

    Patches:

    Version 1.2 by Jerome Haerri (haerri@ieee.org) on 08/22/2005:
         Since a SpatialModel also implements a Graph object, we forbid a Graph extension to be loaded when a SpatialModel is already loaded.

    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    1.0-1.1 Illya Stepanov, 1.0-1.1 Mario Hegele, 1.2 Jerome Haerri

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public int act()
        Executes the extension.

        The method is called on every simulation timestep.
        Specified by:
        act in class ExtensionModule
        Returns:
        0 - the module should be executed on next timesteps, -1 - the module should not be executed on further timesteps and should be removed from the extensions' list

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns module's description.

        Specified by:
        getDescription in class ExtensionModule
        Returns:
        extension module's description

      • addVertex

        public Vertex addVertex(java.lang.String id,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String x,
                        java.lang.String y)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a vertex to the graph.
        Parameters:
        id - identifier
        name - name of the represented location
        x - the x coordinate, should be of type double
        y - the y coordinate, should be of type double
        Returns:
        vertex reference
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown if the vertex already exists in this infrastructure graph or parameters were not acceptable for a new vertex

      • addEdge

        public Edge addEdge(java.lang.String v1_id,
                    java.lang.String v2_id)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds an edge to the infrastructure graph.
        Comment: the vertices which this edge claims to connect need not exist so long.
        Parameters:
        v1_id - the ID of the first vertex
        v2_id - the ID of the second vertex
        Returns:
        edge reference
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public Path[][] getPathMatrix()

      • load

        public void load(org.w3c.dom.Element element)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes the graph from XML tag.

        Version 1.2 by Jerome Haerri (haerri@ieee.org):
            A Spatial model, if defined, can only be loaded after the graph model. This is done in order to be sure that, when the SpatialModel extension is loaded and a Graph model found, the spatial model is able to load the graph.
        Specified by:
        load in interface XMLStreamable
        Overrides:
        load in class ExtensionModule
        Parameters:
        element - source tag
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception if parameters are invalid
